subtask.title: Implement and Test the Pilot Workflow
subtask.objective: Set up a small-scale implementation to evaluate AI integration in real monitoring scenarios.
subtask.scope: Configure tools, deploy models, and monitor performance on test systems.

verification.completion_summary: The collected findings demonstrate an understanding of AI tools, especially Azure AI Studio and GitHub Copilot, with practical guidance on building, deploying, and monitoring AI copilots. However, there is no evidence of actual implementation or testing of a pilot workflow in real monitoring scenarios.

missing_aspects: Actual small-scale implementation in real monitoring environment
Testing and evaluation results in a live pilot scenario
Specific configuration and deployment on test systems
Performance monitoring data from the pilot

missing_requirements: Executing a pilot workflow in a live test environment
Collecting performance and monitoring data in a real scenario
Assessing the effectiveness of the AI integration in actual monitoring tasks
